welcome_screen__get_started_button.name: welcome_screen__get_started_button
welcome_screen__get_started_button.description: A button labeled 'Get started' used to initiate the app usage from the welcome screen.
welcome_screen__get_started_button.effect: tap to navigate to the main_task_screen, which displays tasks under the 'Places to travel' tab, including a toolbar with tabs for 'Starred', 'My Tasks', and 'Places to travel', and a button for creating a new list.

main_task_screen__tabs.name: main_task_screen__tabs
main_task_screen__tabs.description: A toolbar with tabs for navigating between different task lists, including options for starred tasks, personal tasks, places to travel, and creating a new list.
main_task_screen__tabs.effect: tap to navigate to the main_task_screen, displaying tasks under the 'Starred' tab with options to add a star or mark as complete.
xpath:
//*[@resource_id='app_bar_coordinator' and text()='Tasks






My Tasks



New list












No tasks yet
Add your to-dos and keep track of them across Goog']

main_task_screen__switch_task_lists_butt.name: main_task_screen__switch_task_lists_button
main_task_screen__switch_task_lists_butt.description: Button for switching between different task lists.
main_task_screen__switch_task_lists_butt.effect: tap to navigate to the task_list_selection_screen, which displays a bottom sheet with a list of task categories, including options for switching between different task lists or creating a new one.

main_task_screen__change_sort_order_butt.name: main_task_screen__change_sort_order_button
main_task_screen__change_sort_order_butt.description: Button for changing the sort order of the task list.
main_task_screen__change_sort_order_butt.effect: tap to navigate to the sort_popup_screen, which displays a popup for sorting tasks with options including 'Starred recently' and 'Date'.

main_task_screen__more_options_button.name: main_task_screen__more_options_button
main_task_screen__more_options_button.description: Button for accessing more options related to tasks.
main_task_screen__more_options_button.effect: tap to navigate to the list_options_popup_screen, which displays a popup with options for managing a task list, including renaming the list, deleting the list, and deleting all completed tasks.

main_task_screen__create_new_task_button.name: main_task_screen__create_new_task_button
main_task_screen__create_new_task_button.description: Button for creating a new task.
main_task_screen__create_new_task_button.effect: tap to navigate to the task_creation_screen, which allows users to input a task title and provides options to add details, set a date/time, add a star, and save the task.

main_task_screen__task_list.name: main_task_screen__task_list
main_task_screen__task_list.description: A list of tasks displayed with details such as task name, description, due date, star option, and completion status.
main_task_screen__task_list.effect: tap to toggle the star status of the task 'India' within the main_task_screen, which displays tasks under the 'Places to travel' tab.

main_task_screen__task_item.name: main_task_screen__task_item
main_task_screen__task_item.description: An individual task item within the task_list, including task name, description, due date, star option, and completion status.
main_task_screen__task_item.element:
<button alt="Go to the visa center, Due date Mon, Oct 28, 3:45 PM, Starred" id="48" resource_id="task_item_layout">
</button>

main_task_screen__task_name.name: main_task_screen__task_name
main_task_screen__task_name.description: The name of the task presented as a button within the task_item.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='task_name' and text()='Go to the visa center']
main_task_screen__task_name.element:
<button id="50" resource_id="task_name">
 Go to the visa center
</button>

main_task_screen__task_details.name: main_task_screen__task_details
main_task_screen__task_details.description: The details of the task presented as a button within the task_item.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='task_details' and text()='bring 2 photos 2x2  inches each and 100 dollars']
main_task_screen__task_details.element:
<button id="51" resource_id="task_details">
 bring 2 photos 2x2  inches each and 100 dollars
</button>

main_task_screen__star_button.name: main_task_screen__star_button
main_task_screen__star_button.description: Button to add or remove a star from the task within the task_item.

main_task_screen__task_due_date.name: main_task_screen__task_due_date
main_task_screen__task_due_date.description: The due date of the task presented as a button within the task_item.

main_task_screen__task_completed_check.name: main_task_screen__task_completed_check
main_task_screen__task_completed_check.description: Button to mark the task as complete within the task_item.

main_task_screen__completed_count_button.name: main_task_screen__completed_count_button
main_task_screen__completed_count_button.description: Button to view completed tasks count within the task list.
main_task_screen__completed_count_button.effect: tap to expand the completed tasks section within the main_task_screen, displaying the list of completed tasks.

main_task_screen__undo_button.name: main_task_screen__undo_button
main_task_screen__undo_button.description: Button to undo the last action performed on the task list.

main_task_screen__starred_tab_button.name: main_task_screen__starred_tab_button
main_task_screen__starred_tab_button.description: Button to navigate to the 'Starred' tab, displaying tasks marked with a star.
main_task_screen__starred_tab_button.effect: tap to navigate to the starred_tasks_screen, which displays tasks under the 'Starred' tab with options to remove a star or mark as complete.

main_task_screen__my_tasks_tab_button.name: main_task_screen__my_tasks_tab_button
main_task_screen__my_tasks_tab_button.description: Button to navigate to the 'My Tasks' tab, displaying personal tasks.

main_task_screen__new_list_tab_button.name: main_task_screen__new_list_tab_button
main_task_screen__new_list_tab_button.description: Button to create a new task list.

task_creation_screen__task_title_input.name: task_creation_screen__task_title_input
task_creation_screen__task_title_input.description: Input field for entering the task title.
task_creation_screen__task_title_input.effect: set text to update the task title input field, remaining on the task_creation_screen.

task_creation_screen__add_details_button.name: task_creation_screen__add_details_button
task_creation_screen__add_details_button.description: Button to add additional details to the task.
task_creation_screen__add_details_button.effect: tap to remain on the task_creation_screen, allowing users to input a task title and providing options to add details, set a date/time, add a star, and save the task.

task_creation_screen__set_date_time_butt.name: task_creation_screen__set_date_time_button
task_creation_screen__set_date_time_butt.description: Button to set the date and time for the task.
task_creation_screen__set_date_time_butt.effect: tap to navigate to the date_time_selection_screen, which allows users to choose a date from a calendar and set a time for a task. The screen includes navigation buttons for months, options to set time and repeat the task, and buttons to cancel or confirm the selection.

task_creation_screen__add_star_button.name: task_creation_screen__add_star_button
task_creation_screen__add_star_button.description: Button to mark the task as important by adding a star.
task_creation_screen__add_star_button.effect: tap to mark the task as important by adding a star, remaining on the task_creation_screen.

task_creation_screen__save_task_button.name: task_creation_screen__save_task_button
task_creation_screen__save_task_button.description: Button to save the task with the provided details.
task_creation_screen__save_task_button.effect: tap to navigate to the main_task_screen, which displays tasks under the 'Places to travel' tab, including options to add a star and mark as complete.

task_creation_screen__task_details_input.name: task_creation_screen__task_details_input
task_creation_screen__task_details_input.description: Input field for adding additional details to the task.
task_creation_screen__task_details_input.effect: set text to update the task details input field, remaining on the task_creation_screen.

task_creation_screen__pick_due_date_butt.name: task_creation_screen__pick_due_date_button
task_creation_screen__pick_due_date_butt.description: Button to set the due date and time for the task.

task_creation_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <framelayout resource_id="container">
      <viewgroup resource_id="coordinator">
       <view resource_id="touch_outside">
       </view>
       <framelayout resource_id="design_bottom_sheet">
        <viewgroup>
         <scrollview>
          <linearlayout>
           <input resource_id="add_task_title"/>
           <relativelayout resource_id="add_task_bottom_bar">
            <button resource_id="add_task_change_details">
            </button>
            <button resource_id="add_task_pick_due_date">
            </button>
            <button resource_id="star_button">
            </button>
            <button resource_id="add_task_done">
            </button>
           </relativelayout>
          </linearlayout>
         </scrollview>
        </viewgroup>
       </framelayout>
      </viewgroup>
     </framelayout>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

date_time_selection_screen__day_picker_v.name: date_time_selection_screen__day_picker_view
date_time_selection_screen__day_picker_v.description: A list of day buttons within a calendar view, allowing users to select a specific date. It is part of the date and time selection screen.
date_time_selection_screen__day_picker_v.effect: tap to highlight the selected date on the date_time_selection_screen.

date_time_selection_screen__prev_month_b.name: date_time_selection_screen__prev_month_button
date_time_selection_screen__prev_month_b.description: A button to navigate to the previous month in the calendar view.

date_time_selection_screen__next_month_b.name: date_time_selection_screen__next_month_button
date_time_selection_screen__next_month_b.description: A button to navigate to the next month in the calendar view.
date_time_selection_screen__next_month_b.effect: tap to navigate to the next month in the calendar view on the date_time_selection_screen.

date_time_selection_screen__set_time_but.name: date_time_selection_screen__set_time_button
date_time_selection_screen__set_time_but.description: A button to set the time for the task.
date_time_selection_screen__set_time_but.effect: tap to navigate to the time_selection_screen, which allows users to choose a specific minute for a task, displaying a clock interface with buttons for each minute in increments of five, options to toggle between AM and PM, and buttons to switch to text input mode, cancel, or confirm the selection.

date_time_selection_screen__repeat_butto.name: date_time_selection_screen__repeat_button
date_time_selection_screen__repeat_butto.description: A button to set the repeat options for the task.

date_time_selection_screen__cancel_butto.name: date_time_selection_screen__cancel_button
date_time_selection_screen__cancel_butto.description: A button to cancel the date and time selection.

date_time_selection_screen__done_button.name: date_time_selection_screen__done_button
date_time_selection_screen__done_button.description: A button to confirm the date and time selection.
date_time_selection_screen__done_button.effect: tap to navigate to the task_creation_screen, which allows users to input a task title and provides options to add details, set a date/time, add a star, and save the task.

date_time_selection_screen__month_view.name: date_time_selection_screen__month_view
date_time_selection_screen__month_view.description: A list of day buttons within the month view, allowing users to select a specific date. It is part of the day_picker_view.

date_time_selection_screen__selected_tim.name: date_time_selection_screen__selected_time_chip
date_time_selection_screen__selected_tim.description: Displays the selected time with an option to remove it.

date_time_selection_screen__remove_time_.name: date_time_selection_screen__remove_time_button
date_time_selection_screen__remove_time_.description: Button to remove the selected time.

date_time_selection_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <linearlayoutcompat resource_id="parentPanel">
      <framelayout resource_id="customPanel">
       <framelayout resource_id="custom">
        <linearlayout>
         <scrollview resource_id="custom_nested_scrollview">
          <linearlayout>
           <calendarview resource_id="dtp_calendar">
            <viewgroup resource_id="dtp_calendar">
             <scrollbar resource_id="day_picker_view_pager">
              <view resource_id="month_view">
               <button>
               </button>
              </view>
             </scrollbar>
             <button resource_id="prev">
             </button>
             <button resource_id="next">
             </button>
            </viewgroup>
           </calendarview>
           <view resource_id="start_time_top_horizontal_divider">
           </view>
           <linearlayout resource_id="dtp_time_layout">
            <imageview resource_id="dtp_time_img">
            </imageview>
           </linearlayout>
           <view resource_id="start_time_bottom_horizontal_divider">
           </view>
           <linearlayout resource_id="dtp_repeat_layout">
            <imageview resource_id="dtp_repeat_img">
            </imageview>
            <button resource_id="dtp_repeat_label">
            </button>
           </linearlayout>
           <view resource_id="recurrence_horizontal_divider">
           </view>
          </linearlayout>
         </scrollview>
         <linearlayout>
          <button resource_id="dtp_cancel">
          </button>
          <button resource_id="dtp_done">
          </button>
         </linearlayout>
        </linearlayout>
       </framelayout>
      </framelayout>
     </linearlayoutcompat>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

time_selection_screen__clock_face_button.name: time_selection_screen__clock_face_buttons
time_selection_screen__clock_face_button.description: A list of buttons representing each hour on a clock face. Each button corresponds to an hour and can be selected to set the time.
time_selection_screen__clock_face_button.effect: tap to select the 3 o'clock position on the clock face, highlighting the selected time.

time_selection_screen__switch_to_text_in.name: time_selection_screen__switch_to_text_input_button
time_selection_screen__switch_to_text_in.description: A button to switch the time input mode from clock face to text input.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='material_timepicker_mode_button' and @alt='Switch to text input mode for the time input.']
time_selection_screen__switch_to_text_in.element:
<button alt="Switch to text input mode for the time input." id="29" resource_id="material_timepicker_mode_button">
</button>

time_selection_screen__cancel_button.name: time_selection_screen__cancel_button
time_selection_screen__cancel_button.description: A button to cancel the time selection and return to the previous screen.

time_selection_screen__ok_button.name: time_selection_screen__ok_button
time_selection_screen__ok_button.description: A button to confirm the selected time and proceed to the next step.
time_selection_screen__ok_button.effect: tap to navigate to the date_time_selection_screen, which allows users to choose a date from a calendar and set a time for a task, with options to set the time and repeat the task, and buttons to cancel or confirm the selection.

time_selection_screen__minute_buttons.name: time_selection_screen__minute_buttons
time_selection_screen__minute_buttons.description: A list of buttons representing each minute in increments of five on a clock face. Each button corresponds to a minute and can be selected to set the time.
time_selection_screen__minute_buttons.effect: tap to select the 45-minute position on the clock face, highlighting the selected time.

list_creation_screen__list_title_input.name: list_creation_screen__list_title_input
list_creation_screen__list_title_input.description: Input field for entering the title of the new task list.
list_creation_screen__list_title_input.effect: The list title input field is updated with the new text.

list_creation_screen__back_button.name: list_creation_screen__back_button
list_creation_screen__back_button.description: Button to navigate back to the previous screen.

list_creation_screen__done_button.name: list_creation_screen__done_button
list_creation_screen__done_button.description: Button to confirm the creation of the new task list.
list_creation_screen__done_button.effect: tap to navigate to the todo_tasks_screen, which displays tasks under the 'todo' tab, including a toolbar with tabs for 'Starred', 'My Tasks', 'todo', and a button for creating a new list. The main area shows tasks with options to add a star and mark as complete.

sort_popup_screen__sort_options_list.name: sort_popup_screen__sort_options_list
sort_popup_screen__sort_options_list.description: A list of sorting options presented as buttons, allowing the user to select the preferred sorting method.
sort_popup_screen__sort_options_list.effect: tap to navigate to the starred_tasks_screen, which displays tasks under the 'Starred' tab, including a toolbar with tabs, a button for creating a new list, task details, and a bottom bar for switching task lists and changing sort order.

list_options_popup_screen__task_list_opt.name: list_options_popup_screen__task_list_options
list_options_popup_screen__task_list_opt.description: A list of options for managing a task list, including renaming the list, deleting the list, and deleting all completed tasks.
list_options_popup_screen__task_list_opt.effect: tap to navigate to the delete_list_confirmation_screen, which displays a confirmation dialog for deleting a task list, including a title asking if the user wants to delete the list, a message indicating that all tasks in the list will be permanently deleted, and buttons for 'Cancel' and 'Delete'.

list_options_popup_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <framelayout resource_id="container">
      <viewgroup resource_id="coordinator">
       <view resource_id="touch_outside">
       </view>
       <framelayout resource_id="design_bottom_sheet">
        <framelayout>
         <linearlayout>
          <button resource_id="rename_list_option">
          </button>
          <linearlayout resource_id="delete_list_option">
           <button resource_id="delete_list_option_title">
           </button>
          </linearlayout>
          <button resource_id="delete_all_completed_tasks_option">
          </button>
         </linearlayout>
        </framelayout>
       </framelayout>
      </viewgroup>
     </framelayout>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

list_rename_screen__list_name_input.name: list_rename_screen__list_name_input
list_rename_screen__list_name_input.description: Input field for entering the new name of the task list.

list_rename_screen__back_button.name: list_rename_screen__back_button
list_rename_screen__back_button.description: Button to cancel the renaming process and return to the previous screen.
list_rename_screen__back_button.effect: tap to navigate to the main_task_screen, which displays tasks under the 'Places to travel' tab, including options to add a star or mark tasks as complete.

list_rename_screen__done_button.name: list_rename_screen__done_button
list_rename_screen__done_button.description: Button to confirm the renaming of the task list.

task_details_screen__list_dropdown.name: task_details_screen__list_dropdown
task_details_screen__list_dropdown.description: Dropdown button for selecting the task list, currently showing 'Places to travel'.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='edit_list' and text()='Places to travel' and @alt='List, Places to travel selected, 1 of 2']
task_details_screen__list_dropdown.element:
<button alt="List, Places to travel selected, 1 of 2" id="9" resource_id="edit_list">
 Places to travel
</button>

task_details_screen__task_title_input.name: task_details_screen__task_title_input
task_details_screen__task_title_input.description: Input field for displaying and editing the task title.

task_details_screen__add_details_input.name: task_details_screen__add_details_input
task_details_screen__add_details_input.description: Input field for adding additional details to the task.

task_details_screen__add_date_time_butto.name: task_details_screen__add_date_time_button
task_details_screen__add_date_time_butto.description: Button for adding a date and time to the task.

task_details_screen__add_subtasks_button.name: task_details_screen__add_subtasks_button
task_details_screen__add_subtasks_button.description: Button for adding subtasks to the main task.

task_details_screen__back_button.name: task_details_screen__back_button
task_details_screen__back_button.description: Button to navigate back to the previous screen.
task_details_screen__back_button.effect: tap to navigate to the main_task_screen, which displays tasks under the 'Places to travel' tab, including details such as due dates and options to add a star or mark as complete.

task_details_screen__star_option_button.name: task_details_screen__star_option_button
task_details_screen__star_option_button.description: Button to mark the task as important by adding a star.

task_details_screen__more_options_button.name: task_details_screen__more_options_button
task_details_screen__more_options_button.description: Button to access more options for the task.

task_details_screen__mark_completed_butt.name: task_details_screen__mark_completed_button
task_details_screen__mark_completed_butt.description: Button to mark the task as completed.
task_details_screen__mark_completed_butt.effect: tap to navigate to the main_task_screen, which displays tasks under the 'Places to travel' tab, including details such as due dates and options to add a star or mark as complete.

task_details_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <scrollview resource_id="app_bar_coordinator">
      <framelayout resource_id="fragment_container">
       <scrollview resource_id="root_view">
        <linearlayout>
         <button resource_id="edit_list">
         </button>
         <input resource_id="edit_title"/>
         <linearlayout resource_id="edit_details_container">
          <imageview resource_id="edit_details_img">
          </imageview>
          <input resource_id="edit_details"/>
         </linearlayout>
         <linearlayout resource_id="edit_due_date_container">
          <imageview resource_id="edit_due_date_pick">
          </imageview>
          <button resource_id="edit_due_date_hint">
          </button>
         </linearlayout>
         <linearlayout resource_id="edit_subtasks_container">
          <imageview resource_id="edit_subtasks_img">
          </imageview>
          <linearlayout resource_id="edit_subtasks_list">
           <framelayout resource_id="edit_subtasks_add_hint">
            <button resource_id="edit_subtasks_add_label">
            </button>
           </framelayout>
          </linearlayout>
         </linearlayout>
        </linearlayout>
       </scrollview>
      </framelayout>
      <linearlayout resource_id="tasks_app_bar_layout">
       <viewgroup resource_id="toolbar">
        <button>
        </button>
        <linearlayoutcompat>
         <button resource_id="star_option">
         </button>
         <button>
         </button>
        </linearlayoutcompat>
       </viewgroup>
      </linearlayout>
      <viewgroup resource_id="tasks_bottom_app_bar">
       <button resource_id="edit_task_complete_button">
       </button>
      </viewgroup>
     </scrollview>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

task_list_selection_screen__task_categor.name: task_list_selection_screen__task_categories_list
task_list_selection_screen__task_categor.description: A list of task categories presented as buttons, allowing the user to switch between different task lists or create a new one.
task_list_selection_screen__task_categor.effect: tap to navigate to the main_task_screen, which displays tasks under the 'Places to travel' tab, including a toolbar with tabs, task details, and options to manage tasks.
xpath:
//*[@resource_id='task_lists' and text()='Starred


My Tasks


Places to travel



Create new list']

task_list_selection_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <framelayout resource_id="container">
      <viewgroup resource_id="coordinator">
       <view resource_id="touch_outside">
       </view>
       <framelayout resource_id="design_bottom_sheet">
        <recyclerview resource_id="task_lists">
         <linearlayout resource_id="starred_list_item_layout">
          <imageview resource_id="smart_view_icon">
          </imageview>
          <button resource_id="smart_view_menu_item_text">
          </button>
         </linearlayout>
         <linearlayout resource_id="task_list_item_layout">
          <button resource_id="task_list_menu_item_text">
          </button>
         </linearlayout>
         <linearlayout resource_id="create_new_list_item_layout">
          <imageview resource_id="plus_icon">
          </imageview>
          <button resource_id="create_new_list_item_text">
          </button>
         </linearlayout>
        </recyclerview>
       </framelayout>
      </viewgroup>
     </framelayout>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

starred_tasks_screen__tabs.name: starred_tasks_screen__tabs
starred_tasks_screen__tabs.description: A list of tabs for navigating between different task categories, including Starred, My Tasks, Places to travel, and New list.

starred_tasks_screen__tasks_list.name: starred_tasks_screen__tasks_list
starred_tasks_screen__tasks_list.description: A list of tasks under the Starred tab. Each task includes details such as the task name, due date, and options to remove a star or mark as complete.
xpath:
//*[@resource_id='tasks_list' and text()='Starred recently



India








Go to the visa center
bring 2 photos 2x2  inches each and 100 dollars


Mon, Oct 28, 3:45 PM']

starred_tasks_screen__task_item.name: starred_tasks_screen__task_item
starred_tasks_screen__task_item.description: An individual task item within the tasks_list, including task name, star button, and completion button.

starred_tasks_screen__switch_task_lists_.name: starred_tasks_screen__switch_task_lists_button
starred_tasks_screen__switch_task_lists_.description: Button to switch between different task lists.

starred_tasks_screen__sort_task_list_but.name: starred_tasks_screen__sort_task_list_button
starred_tasks_screen__sort_task_list_but.description: Button to change the sort order of the tasks.
starred_tasks_screen__sort_task_list_but.effect: tap to navigate to the sort_popup_screen, which displays a popup for sorting tasks with options such as Starred recently and Date.

delete_confirmation_screen__confirmation.effect: tap to navigate to the main_task_screen, which displays tasks under the 'Places to travel' tab, including task details and options to manage tasks.

delete_confirmation_screen__cancel_butto.name: delete_confirmation_screen__cancel_button
delete_confirmation_screen__cancel_butto.description: A button to cancel the deletion of completed tasks.

delete_confirmation_screen__delete_butto.name: delete_confirmation_screen__delete_button

delete_list_confirmation_screen__delete_.name: delete_list_confirmation_screen__delete_button

delete_list_confirmation_screen__delete_.effect: tap to navigate to the my_tasks_screen, which displays tasks under the 'My Tasks' tab, including options to manage tasks and create new lists.

my_tasks_screen__task_lists_pager.name: my_tasks_screen__task_lists_pager
my_tasks_screen__task_lists_pager.description: A list of task items displayed under the 'My Tasks' tab. Each task item includes task details such as name, due date, and options to remove a star or mark as complete.
my_tasks_screen__task_lists_pager.effect: scroll down to view more tasks under the 'My Tasks' tab, maintaining the current screen layout and options.

my_tasks_screen__task_item_layout.description: An individual task item within the task_lists_pager, containing task data such as task name, details, due date, and options to remove a star or mark as complete.

todo_tasks_screen__tabs.name: todo_tasks_screen__tabs
todo_tasks_screen__tabs.description: A list of tabs for navigating between different task categories, including Starred, My Tasks, todo, and New list.
todo_tasks_screen__tabs.effect: tap to navigate to the starred_tasks_screen, which displays tasks under the 'Starred' tab, including task details such as due dates and options to remove a star or mark as complete.

todo_tasks_screen__switch_task_lists_but.name: todo_tasks_screen__switch_task_lists_button
todo_tasks_screen__switch_task_lists_but.description: Button for switching between different task lists.

todo_tasks_screen__sort_task_list_button.name: todo_tasks_screen__sort_task_list_button
todo_tasks_screen__sort_task_list_button.description: Button for changing the sort order of the task list.

todo_tasks_screen__more_options_button.name: todo_tasks_screen__more_options_button
todo_tasks_screen__more_options_button.description: Button for accessing more options related to tasks.

todo_tasks_screen__create_new_task_butto.name: todo_tasks_screen__create_new_task_button
todo_tasks_screen__create_new_task_butto.description: Button for creating a new task within the current task list.
todo_tasks_screen__create_new_task_butto.effect: tap to navigate to the task_creation_todo_screen, which is for creating a new task within the 'todo' list, including an input field for the task title and buttons for adding details, setting a date/time, starring the task, and saving it.

todo_tasks_screen__task_list.name: todo_tasks_screen__task_list
todo_tasks_screen__task_list.description: A list of tasks under the 'todo' tab. Each task includes options to add a star and mark as complete.
todo_tasks_screen__task_list.effect: tap to add a star to the selected task within the todo_tasks_screen, which remains on the same screen displaying tasks under the 'todo' tab.

todo_tasks_screen__task_item.name: todo_tasks_screen__task_item
todo_tasks_screen__task_item.description: An individual task item within the task_list, including the task name, star button, and complete button.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='task_item_layout' and text()='wash my clothes' and @alt='wash my clothes']

todo_tasks_screen__task_name.name: todo_tasks_screen__task_name
todo_tasks_screen__task_name.description: The name of the task presented as a button within the task_item.

todo_tasks_screen__complete_task_button.name: todo_tasks_screen__complete_task_button
todo_tasks_screen__complete_task_button.description: Button to mark the task as complete within the task_item.

todo_tasks_screen__star_button.name: todo_tasks_screen__star_button
todo_tasks_screen__star_button.description: Button to add a star to the task within the task_item.

task_creation_todo_screen__task_title_in.name: task_creation_todo_screen__task_title_input
task_creation_todo_screen__task_title_in.description: Input field for entering the task title, initially displaying a placeholder text.
task_creation_todo_screen__task_title_in.effect: set text to update the task title input field.

task_creation_todo_screen__add_details_b.name: task_creation_todo_screen__add_details_button
task_creation_todo_screen__add_details_b.description: Button for adding additional details to the task.

task_creation_todo_screen__set_date_time.name: task_creation_todo_screen__set_date_time_button
task_creation_todo_screen__set_date_time.description: Button for setting the date and time for the task.

task_creation_todo_screen__add_star_butt.name: task_creation_todo_screen__add_star_button
task_creation_todo_screen__add_star_butt.description: Button for starring the task to mark it as important.

task_creation_todo_screen__save_button.name: task_creation_todo_screen__save_button
task_creation_todo_screen__save_button.description: Button for saving the task after entering the details.
task_creation_todo_screen__save_button.effect: tap to navigate to the todo_tasks_screen, which displays tasks under the 'todo' tab, including options to add a star and mark as complete, with a toolbar for switching tabs and creating a new list.

task_creation_todo_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <framelayout resource_id="container">
      <viewgroup resource_id="coordinator">
       <framelayout resource_id="design_bottom_sheet">
        <viewgroup>
         <scrollview>
          <linearlayout>
           <input resource_id="add_task_title"/>
           <relativelayout resource_id="add_task_bottom_bar">
            <button resource_id="add_task_change_details">
            </button>
            <button resource_id="add_task_pick_due_date">
            </button>
            <button resource_id="star_button">
            </button>
            <button resource_id="add_task_done">
            </button>
           </relativelayout>
          </linearlayout>
         </scrollview>
        </viewgroup>
       </framelayout>
      </viewgroup>
     </framelayout>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>
